com.samskivert.util
Interface RunQueue

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicRunQueue, Invoker
public interface RunQueue

An interface for a service that queues up execution of Runnables.

Nested Class Summary
static class RunQueue.AsExecutor
          Wee helper class to adapt a RunQueue into an Executor.

          A useful RunQueue that uses the AWT dispatch thread.

Field Detail

AWT

static final RunQueue AWT
A useful RunQueue that uses the AWT dispatch thread.

Method Detail

postRunnable

void postRunnable(Runnable r)
Post the specified Runnable to be run on the RunQueue.

isDispatchThread

boolean isDispatchThread()
Returns:
true if the calling thread is the RunQueue dispatch thread.

isRunning

boolean isRunning()
Returns:
true if this run queue is still processing runnables, false if it has been shutdown.
